txt.en: You have defeat many stone-smashers in Gundabad and greatly assisted Bráthi and all those who seek to conquer the Three Peaks and reclaim the Mountain-home.
'[placeholder], stone-smashers threaten all of the rare treasures and mineral deposits in Gundabad! We must defeat these brutes before they destroy what makes Gundabad a place of beauty and wonder!'
Bráthi the Master Prospector seeks to halt those who wish to destroy the rare treasures of Gundabad.
Stone-smashers found throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should defeat stone-smashers for Bráthi.
